name: RYB
description: RYB is a pure logic puzzle game where you color strange and beautiful shapes. It plays like a combination between sudoku and minesweeper, and was designed by a Top-10 finisher in the US Puzzle Championship.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Atom 1.67 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
